body: Translators really need to translate all of dhibi's work, for the dialogue is part of what makes these doujins incredible, at least in my personal opinion.

Dhibi is probably my favorite visual artist. Although honestly there is some amazing 3D stuff out there these days- completely different theme than Dhibi, if you want your mind blown find "Steven Purgatory"s work. Its basicallics great too.y Loli-Domme vs Ogres in "sex-battles", also theres an evil Futa around.  The most epic violent but not sadistic sex ever, and also lots of karate. :)   The sound / music is great too.  Anyway- theres lots of types of neat stuff to lewd on, 2D, 3D, probably even 4D these days.
